about.title: About
about.p1: WebTools is a collection of fast, privacy‑friendly utilities for everyday work. Convert, format, preview and optimize files directly in your browser—no uploads, no sign‑in, and everything runs client‑side.
about.p2: This project is built with Next.js, React, and a sprinkle of neon‑styled UI. We focus on clean UX, accessible components, and speed.

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrCodeGenerator.description: Generate QR codes from text, URLs, or any data. Customize size, colors, and error correction level.
qrCodeGenerator.textOrUrlPlaceholder: Enter text, URL, or any data to encode...
qrCodeGenerator.enterTextToGenerate: Enter text above to generate QR code
qrCodeGenerator.aboutQRCodes1: QR codes can store up to 4,296 alphanumeric characters
qrCodeGenerator.aboutQRCodes2: Higher error correction levels allow codes to work even when partially damaged
qrCodeGenerator.aboutQRCodes3: Use "High" error correction for codes that may be printed or displayed in low quality
qrCodeGenerator.aboutQRCodes4: QR codes are free to use and don't require any special permissions
qrCodeGenerator.copySuccess: QR code SVG copied to clipboard!

imageMetadataViewer.title: Image Metadata Viewer
imageMetadataViewer.description: View EXIF data, camera settings, GPS coordinates, and other metadata from your images.
imageMetadataViewer.noMetadata: No metadata found in this image. The image may have been processed or stripped of EXIF data.

errors.failedToRead: Failed to read image metadata. Please try another image.

info.title: About Image Metadata
info.point1: EXIF data is embedded in images by cameras and photo editing software
info.point2: Not all images contain metadata - some may have been stripped for privacy
info.point3: GPS coordinates reveal the location where a photo was taken
info.point4: All processing happens client-side - your images never leave your browser
